The description of hypervisor statistics response was not for one hypervisor, but all hypervisors. So I will modify the description of the following items from "this hypervisor" to "all hypervisors":
disk_available_least
free_disk_gb
free_ram_mb
local_gb
local_gb_used
memory_mb
memory_mb_used
vcpus
vcpus_used
title: update the description of hypervisor statistics response
